description:
Nishikata is put on cleaning duty as a punishment for interrupting class.
As he goes to the cleaning supply storage, Takagi-san is there! Was she put on cleaning duty too?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Corvée de nettoyage / La barre fixe / Le rhume / La filature
掃除当番 / 逆上がり / 風邪 / 尾行
